name: Tyler Tactics DEMO
description:
The official Tyler Tactics Anthology demo! Join Tyler Tactics on an absurd action-comedy adventure as he faces off against corrupt politicians, rival businessmen, and innocent bystanders alike.  

The Tyler Tactics Anthology is currently in development, with a release date sometime in Fall 2022. Follow us @BSequiturGames on twitter for game updates and release information!

WARNING: The web version of this demo has known framerate issues. If you are experiencing unplayable lag, download the windows or mac standalone version!
